getDependencyList

public static final java.util.ArrayList getDependencyList(RECKParseTreeImpl rpTree,
                                                          RECKCTTreeNodeImpl CTTree)
Print the internal part of a tree having already identified it. The ID and outer XML element is printed wrapping this method, but none of the internal content.

Parameters:
t - The tree to print. Now known to be non-null
pw - Where to print it to
inXml - Whether to use XML style printing
